HR Services - HR Direct Portal Leader

HR Direct Program Owner - Lead the global HR self service portal for managers, employees and HR professionals utilized in 75 countries by 127,000 users- Led successful deployment of HR Direct self service/direct access tool from 22 to 75 countries, from 5,000 to 127,000 users- Develop HR self service portal Strategic Roadmap, annual budget of $1M- Partner with the HR Centers of Excellence to improve the user experience: Benefits, Compensation, Diversity, HR Shared Services, Legal and Employee Relations, Organizational Design and Development, Mergers and Acquisitions and Staffing - Understand, apply and leverage Human centered design principles, and leverage features and capabilities that are inherent in the Portal. . - Utilize voice of the customer and usability input in form of workshops, metrics, one-on-one usability exercises to determine the HR portal strategy- Partner with HR IT to establish and deploy Agile repeatable processes to support, upgrade and leverage the HR Portal

recommendations: Mark Tucker
HR Technology Product Owner, Integration Leader
September 26, 2016, Helenmarie Mendoza worked with Mark in the same group

Helenmarie is amazing. to work with. Her work methodology is solid.  Taking into account all variables, both upstream and downstream, before making decisions.  When the decisions are made they are fully formed and complete.  Naturally this prevents confusion in the goal and delivery for her. She will drive you to improve and provide great feedback.  At the same time she is a natural leader in any group setting I've participated in with her.  She will keep team members focused and on task, expecting that they will do their work without micromanaging.Her demeanour is always positive.  Even in the most stressful circumstances she stays on point and follows through.  I have been honoured to work with and learn from her for the past three years.

Jewell Weatherly
September 9, 2016, Jewell managed Helenmarie Mendoza directly

Helenmarie is exceptionally talented in both Human Resources Management/Leadership and Business Development/Marketing.  She understands business, and inspires others with her style of leadership to gain positive results for the profitability of the company.  She has worked in every functional area within Human Resources and she is capable of seeing/understanding the "big picture" by tying together all functional areas to enable businesses to succeed.  She has strategic thinking and is also capable of multitasking with a detail orientation.  She has extremely high integrity, very thorough in the preparation, knowledge gathering and details of her work.  When she completes an assignment you can be assured that the information is thoroughly examined, unbiased and correct. She is extremely dedicated and reliable.  She always met deadlines with the highest quality and standards of work. She also ensured that those who worked with her had the same high standards and quality. She is a very quick study and is eager to learn and share her learning with others. She is self motivated, driven to excellence, and needs little to no supervision or direction.  She is a creative thinker who puts her knowledge and leadership skills to work for the company.  She is a great team leader and player and a catalyst for change.  She is a leader who inspires others to do their best work and gives them credit for their results.  She is a leader who enjoys seeing the success of others.  I highly recommend Helenmarie to any company who is looking for strong innovative leadership to attract and retain top talent.  Helenmarie knows how to attract and retain the best of the best talent.  She is capable of keeping them inspired to gain results for the bottom line profitability.Jewell Weatherly, Global HR & Business Consultant & Leadership Coach

Mark Tucker
HR Technology Product Owner, Integration Leader
December 16, 2016, Mark worked with Helenmarie Mendoza in the same group

I worked with Mark Tucker for 3 years on Honeywell’s Human Resources (HR) self-service portal, used by 127,00 managers, employees and HR professionals in 75 countries.  Mark led a global team (Mexico, China, India, and Czech Republic) driving operations and delivering solutions.   Mark utilized Human centered design principles and User Experience to deliver user friendly and timely solutions.  Mark has the ability to look at complex global issues and determine a path for the team to work to define the right solution.  He developed his team to lead projects and develop their skills to add value to our organization.  The HR Centers of Excellence (COEs) relied on him to partner with them as customers and ensured their needs were met in our HR self-service portal.  Mark has an excellent technical background and works well with HR IT Team and has utilized the Agile methodology.  It was a pleasure to work with Mark, I learned a great deal from him.  I hope I have the opportunity to work with him again soon.

Skilled at partnering with global business leaders to spearhead enhancements and streamline business productivity in diverse business environments.
